name: Bowdoin College Virtual Field Trip: Giant's Stairs (mattdonnelly)
name_original: Bowdoin College Virtual Field Trip: Giant's Stairs (mattdonnelly)
description: Participate in a guided first-person POV laboratory at the Giant's Stairs of Casco Bay. Explore local rock formations and analyze geological and spatial aspects of the environment. Use in coordination with a blackboard survey. Version 2.0.
